name: Typhoon Hyper Caliber Multistage Accelerated Electromagnetic-Chemical Hybrid Propulsion Cannon
Exemplar Radar System
customPrimary:
All non-PD weapons on this ship get range bonus up to %s if their facing is aligned with this radar.

All Medium Energy Weapons additionally get %s range bonus.

name: Aphotic Zone Coil Accelerator
customPrimary: While charging, this weapon shoots a stream of shards, dealing around %s kinetic damage and generating %s soft flux in total.

name: Black Star G Great Chaingun
customPrimary: When hitting hull, each shot has a %s chance to deal extra %s FRAG damage.

name: Anomalous Missile
customPrimary: When exploded, the missile spawns several storms, they generate shield-piercing EMP arcs hitting any nearby enemy ship and dealing massive amounts of EMP damage.

name: NGW-R23 Rail Artillery
customPrimary: Its projectiles can pass through allies, but are considered missiles and can be intercepted.

name: NGW-G2 Rocket-assisted Cannon
customPrimary: Its projectiles can pass through allies, but are considered missiles and can be intercepted.

name: Built-in Micro DEM
customPrimary: The missile will fire a beam at the target at close range within %s seconds, dealing %s EN damage. This damage is influenced by modifiers that affect missile weapon damage rather than energy weapon damage.

name: Recoil Gun
customPrimary: When hitting shields, it deals extra KE damage equal to its EMP damage in soft flux.

name: Boiling Laser - High Output
customPrimary: When hit, it spawns EMP arcs jump around a distance of %s, hitting up to %s enemies and dealing %s EN damage to each.

name: Boiling Laser - Repeating
customPrimary: Beam is divided into %s small beams

name: Fighter Pointer
customPrimary: Guide the built-in fighter to the endpoint of this beam.

name: DF-2 Heavy ERA
customPrimary: When the hull around this weapon takes a damage that is greater than or equal to %s or %s times the ship's armor, the ERA triggers, consuming 1 ammo and reducing that damage by %s.

name: Tesla Arc Emitter
customPrimary: When hitting ships, this weapon spawns %s shield-piercing EMP arcs every second. Each arc deals %s EN damage and %s EMP damage, in addition to reducing the target's maximum speed by %s.

name: EB-300k Multi-purpose Laser
customPrimary: Beam is divided into %s small beams

name: 107 Rocket Launcher
customPrimary: When hitting shields, it only deals soft flux.

name: HV7 Smart Cannon
customPrimary: When its projectiles approach a Destroyer or Frigate, it will split into %s submunitions. Each one dealing %s EN damage and targeting a random enemy within %s radius.

name: MB32 Dual-purpose MG
customPrimary: All projectiles can reach a range of %s, only %s of projectiles can achieve their full range.

name: DG-3 Cyclone
customPrimary: When hitting a hull where armor is completely stripped, cause the target to lose %s hull integrity.

name: d100t-MBC
customPrimary: When hitting hulls, the damage is reduced by %s.

name: Door Breach Torpedo
customPrimary: When hitting shields, it deals extra kinetic energy damage equal to EMP damage in soft flux. If that hit causes an overload, it lasts only %s seconds.

name: Door Breach Torpedo Pod
customPrimary: When hitting shields, it deals extra kinetic energy damage equal to EMP damage in soft flux. If that hit causes an overload, it lasts only %s seconds.

name: Blast Hammer LRM Pod
customPrimary: When hit, the impact only deals a small damage. It then shoots %s jets, each one dealing a FRAG damage of %s of the total.

name: Blast Hammer LRM System
customPrimary: When hit, the impact only deals a small damage. It then shoots %s jets, each one dealing a FRAG damage of %s of the total.

name: Disposal Flux Tube
customPrimary: When the flux level of this ship is above %s, this weapon will fire automatically and reduce flux by %s.

name: Disposal Flux Tube Pod
customPrimary: When the flux level of this ship is above %s, this weapon will fire automatically and reduce flux by %s.

name: Nail Gun LRM
customPrimary: When hitting shields, it deals an extra %s kinetic damage in soft flux.

name: Nail Gun LRM System
customPrimary: When hitting shields, it deals an extra %s kinetic damage in soft flux.

name: DF-1 ERA
customPrimary: When the hull around this weapon takes a damage that is greater than or equal to %s or %s times the ship's armor, the ERA triggers, consuming 1 ammo and reducing that damage by %s.

name: Pushpin Magnet Bomb Cluster
customPrimary: When its projectiles approach an enemy, it will split into %s magnet bombs, each one dealing %s HE damage.

name: Pushpin Magnet Bomb Cluster Pod
customPrimary: When its projectiles approach an enemy, it will split into %s magnet bombs, each one dealing %s HE damage.

name: Tyre Spike Phase Mine
customPrimary:
Those mines have extremely long lifetime and will remain in phase space with no collision until the fuse is armed.

At most %s mines can coexist on the battlefield. That cap is lift by %s for each of these weapons mounted on a deployed ship.

name: Scrape Beam - Fighter
customPrimary: When hitting hulks, it deals extra FRAG damage and recycles supplies. Those supplies are added to your cargo if the done made its way landing.

name: Magnet Bomb - Fighter
customPrimary: The magnet bomb will be attracted to nearby enemy ships, including phased ships.

name: Anchor ADS System
customPrimary: Its projectiles are considered missiles and can intercept other projectiles. When meeting a missile-piercing projectile, reducing its damage by %s.

name: Flux Absorber - Fighter
customPrimary:
When hitting a ship, transfer the target's flux to this ship as hard flux at a speed of %s. If the target is using a ship system that prevents dissipation, no transfer will occur.

Works better with FSF ships.

name: Repair Beam - Fighter
customPrimary:
When hitting a ship, repair its armor by %s + %s, up to %s of the maximum armor. Exceeded repair will restore hull integrity up to %s.

Works better with FSF ships.

name: Boom Lance
customPrimary: This weapon fires automatically if its tip touches a ship and will not go offline

name: Lightening Disturb Gun
customPrimary: When hitting shield, it applies a stackable debuff to the target: For the next %s seconds, increase the target's shield upkeep by %s.

name: Sea Roar Super-heavy Railway Cannon
customPrimary: When hitting a ship, if it overloads the target, the projectile will continue forward.
